attributes.action: Pay all households a one off £10,000 grant during the Covid-19 Crisis.
attributes.additional_details: UC / Deferred Tax / HMRC Grants to be paid in June / Furlough are taking too long to pass down to people who are now even more under increasing financial pressure. By providing such grants now this will stop people put food on the table and keep households running.
attributes.background: Household grant of £10,000 per household to get families through the covid-19 crisis. So people will stop risking their lives to work and now they have enough money for food and bills.Instead of UC or other HMRC methods. Real Money to help people now not tomorrow
